text: dhlk aldhy akhbrtkm bh- 'ayuha alnas- min alnaeim walkaramat fi alakhirat hu albushraa alty yubashir allah biha eibadah aladhin amanuu bih fi aldunya wataewh. qul -ayha alrswl- liladhin yshkwn fi alssaeat min mshrky qwmk: laa 'as'alukum ealaa ma 'adeukum 'iilayh min alhaqi aladhi jitukum bih ewdana min amwalkm, 'iilaa 'an tawadduny fi qrabty mnkm, wtasilu alrahim alty bayni wbynkm. wamin yktsb hasanatan ndaefha lah bieashr fsaedana. 'iina allah ghafur ldhnwb ebadh, shakur lhsnathm wtaethm 'iyah
